data.title: The Sin of Olga Brandt (1915)
data.meta_description: Olga Brandt, a stenographer in the office of Stephen Leslie, an attorney, receives a pitifully small salary. In addition she is handicapped by having the sole care of an invalid sister. An operation is necessary to save the girl’s life. But Olga is penniless.
data.text: Olga Brandt, a stenographer in the office of Stephen Leslie, an attorney, receives a pitifully small salary. In addition she is handicapped by having the sole care of an invalid sister. An operation is necessary to save the girl’s life. But Olga is penniless.
